caption: In a room, a man dressed in black is engaged in a conversation. Suddenly, a young girl enters, disguised as a servant. They recognize her true identity and have a discussion with her, giving her some tasks to complete. Afterward, the young girl leaves the room and goes to fetch water.At the water source, she encounters another man, and they seem to share a close relationship. While conversing, the man appears to inquire about something from the girl.Meanwhile, in a snowy landscape, two men dressed in black traverse through deep snowdrifts. They continue walking until they join a larger group in a particular location. Their mission appears to involve some form of shadowy assistance.
